author: Joel Achenbach
title: Three months into the pandemic, here is what we know about the coronavirus - The Washington Post
description: Three months into the pandemic, here is what we know about the coronavirus The Washington Post Scientists Find Strains of Coronaviruses Closely Related to COVID-19 virus in Pangolins Newsweek Not wearing masks to protect against coronavirus is a 'big mistake,…
content: But there is one critically important, calamitous feature of SARS-CoV-2: the novelty. When it jumped from an animal host into the human population sometime late last year, no one had immunity to it. Thats one reason the new coronavirus isnt comparable to a ha… [+7787 chars]
